creditline: Gift of David Tausig Frank and Kazukuni Sugiyama
description: inside wooden box with inscriptions; wrapped in tissue; light green fabric; image of dark mountains with fog in background and small waterfall in foreground; inscription UR corner
markings: poem UR red seal: 无心 {mushin}; LL red seals: 字曰子徳 {azana iwaku shitoku}, 静處 {seisho} [seisho #2]; LLC red seal: [unread #4]
signed: 昭和乙亥夏日　古道人畫并題 {Shōwa kinotoi kajitsu Kodōjin ga hei dai}　(A summer day in 1935)
title: Landscape after Mi Fu
